data.name: Rise Of The White Sun
data.detailed_description:
SUBSCRIBE TO GET NOTIFIED WHEN CLOSED BETA WILL BE AVAILABLE


About the Game

Rise of the White Sun is the deepest political simulator of the Chinese Warlord era.

Play as every significant faction of 1920’s China : the Guomindang, the Chinese Communist Party, the Warlords and even the masters of the underworld - the Green Gang.

December 1926: as the victorious National Revolutionary Army units commanded by Bai Chongxi are approaching Shanghai, CCP and GMD agents are busy planning an uprising. Behind the scenes, high-ranking warlord officers are negotiating a comfortable future for themselves in exchange for betraying their masters while Jiang Jieshi is plotting with the Green Gang to get rid of his communist allies.

This is a time of dishonest plots and brutal action.

Manage your provinces

-Fight bandits and Pirates

-Raise rural militias

-Build Arsenals, Railways and many improvements

-Decide bold societal policies

Organize Urban and Rural Revolutionary Uprisings

-Revive the epic Canon strikes and Shanghai Uprisings

-Cultivate your relationships and rally the many Associations and Organizations of the Chinese Society

-Organize Unions, strike pickets and plan a general strike or a boycott of foreign industries

Conduct military operations

-Corrupt enemy generals

-Raise and train your armies

-Launch military expeditions like the Northern Expedition

-Create your Communist rural base

Etc...

Survive the murky plots inside your own faction

-Define the policy of your faction

-Reunify China under your banner

-Consolidate your power inside your faction

data.short_description: Rise of the White Sun is one of the deepest political simulator set in the Chinese Warlord era. Play as every significant faction of 1920’s China : the Guomindang, the Chinese Communist Party, the Warlords and even the masters of the underworld - the Green Gang.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window s7
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2)
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
